messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Your station has been randomly selected for a nuclear operative drill. This will last about 5 minutes and begin soon. Please behave how you would in the actual scenario of Nuke Ops.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please refrain from harming the Operative Volunteers.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: AI, you are in charge of making sure this simulation runs smoothly, alright?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the drill will be cut short. Please space all Syndicate Equipment you may have gained to preserve NanoTrasen Superiority.
